product_name: Patagonia Lightweight Travel Mini Hip Pack
long_description: The Patagonia Lightweight Travel Mini Hip Pack carries the bare essentials you need for a run, hike or bike ride. Main compartment has a zippered security pocket that doubles as a stuff sack when hip pack is not in use. Zippered exterior pocket provides quick access to lip balm or snacks. Key clip hangs inside main compartment. Soft, flexible webbing belt lets you carry the Patagonia Lightweight Travel Mini Hip Pack around your waist or off-the-shoulder, bandolier style. Made from 1.8-oz., 40-denier double-ripstop nylon with a polyurethane coating and a silicone finish. Bottom is reinforced with 6.3-oz., 210-denier double-ripstop nylon that has a polyurethane coating.
short_description: The Patagonia Lightweight Travel Mini Hip Pack carries the bare essentials you need for a run, hike or bike ride.
